roleset.name: to attach a label
roleset.note: TAG-V NOTES: Member of VNcls butter-9.9, illustrate-25.3. (from tag.01-v)
TAG-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on tag-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls butter-9.9. (from tag.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: Hyundai Motor America , fighting quality complaints , declining sales and management turmoil , yesterday unveiled [its 1990 ad strategy]-1 , tagged [*]-1 `` We 're Making More Sense Than Ever . ''
example.arg: We 're Making More Sense Than Ever

example.name: where the 'tag' is a price tag-- syntax still fits so far
example.text: Digital-1 is expected *-1 to tag its new line from about $ 1.24 million to $ 4.4 million and up , depending on configuration .
example.arg: from about $ 1.24 million to $4.4 million and up

example.name: args1, 2, TMP
example.text: Turkey won many hearts with their tag of being the 'comeback kings' during the tournament.

roleset.name: go along with
roleset.note: Based on SMS data. Comarison with accompany. Framed by Katie.

example.name: with end point
example.text: Ya, I'll tag along with 'cha to the bars.
